title: Shopkeeper.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
Hello, what would you want to upgrade?
[[Upgrade swords|Shopkeeper.upgradeSwords]]
[[Upgrade pickaxe|Shopkeeper.upgradePickaxe]]
[[Upgrade bags|Shopkeeper.upgradeBags]]
[[Upgrade helmets|Shopkeeper.upgradeHelmets]]
[[Upgrade armor|Shopkeeper.upgradeArmor]]

title: Shopkeeper.upgradeSwords
body:
Stronger Swords this time?
I suppose it's worth it.
More damage never hurt anyone.
<<upgradeSwordLevel CampEventController>>
[[....|Shopkeeper.ResolveDialog]]

title: Shopkeeper.upgradeBags
body:
Better bags today?
Deeper pockets to hold more crystal.
A wise choice
<<upgradeBagLevel CampEventController>>
[[....|Shopkeeper.ResolveDialog]]

title: Shopkeeper.upgradeHelmets
body:
Better helmets! Gotta protect that head of yours.
The lights on these are slightly brighter.
Maybe you'll notice a difference
<<upgradeHelmetLevel CampEventController>>
[[....|Shopkeeper.ResolveDialog]]

title: Shopkeeper.upgradeArmor
body:
A heavier set of armor?
the best offense is good defense...after all...
<<upgradeArmorLevel CampEventController>>
[[....|Shopkeeper.ResolveDialog]]

title: Shopkeeper.upgradePickaxe
body:
Ah, new pickaxes. Slightly sharper than before.
Might make mining easier
<<upgradePickaxeLevel CampEventController>>
[[....|Shopkeeper.ResolveDialog]]
